11#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/subband_erle_estimator.h"
12
13#include <algorithm>
14#include <functional>
15
16#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
17#include "rtc_base/numerics/safe_minmax.h"
18#include "system_wrappers/include/field_trial.h"
19
20namespace webrtc {
21
22namespace {
23
24constexpr float kX2BandEnergyThreshold = 44015068.0f;
25constexpr int kBlocksToHoldErle = 100;
26constexpr int kBlocksForOnsetDetection = kBlocksToHoldErle + 150;
27constexpr int kPointsToAccumulate = 6;
28
29std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1> SetMaxErleBands(float max_erle_l,
30 float max_erle_h) {
31 std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1> max_erle;
32 std::fill(max_erle.begin(), max_erle.begin() + kFftLengthBy2 / 2, max_erle_l);
33 std::fill(max_erle.begin() + kFftLengthBy2 / 2, max_erle.end(), max_erle_h);
34 return max_erle;
35}
36
37bool EnableMinErleDuringOnsets() {
38 return !field_trial::IsEnabled("WebRTC-Aec3MinErleDuringOnsetsKillSwitch");
39}
40
41} // namespace
42
43SubbandErleEstimator::SubbandErleEstimator(const EchoCanceller3Config& config,
44 size_t num_capture_channels)
45 : use_onset_detection_(config.erle.onset_detection),
46 min_erle_(config.erle.min),
47 max_erle_(SetMaxErleBands(config.erle.max_l, config.erle.max_h)),
48 use_min_erle_during_onsets_(EnableMinErleDuringOnsets()),
49 accum_spectra_(num_capture_channels),
50 erle_(num_capture_channels),
51 erle_onset_compensated_(num_capture_channels),
52 erle_during_onsets_(num_capture_channels),
53 coming_onset_(num_capture_channels),
54 hold_counters_(num_capture_channels) {
55 Reset();
56}
57
58SubbandErleEstimator::~SubbandErleEstimator() = default;
59
60void SubbandErleEstimator::Reset() {
61 const size_t num_capture_channels = erle_.size();
62 for (size_t ch = 0; ch < num_capture_channels; ++ch) {
63 erle_[ch].fill(min_erle_);
64 erle_onset_compensated_[ch].fill(min_erle_);
65 erle_during_onsets_[ch].fill(min_erle_);
66 coming_onset_[ch].fill(true);
67 hold_counters_[ch].fill(0);
68 }
69 ResetAccumulatedSpectra();
70}
71
72void SubbandErleEstimator::Update(
73 rtc::ArrayView<const float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1> X2,
74 rtc::ArrayView<const std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>> Y2,
75 rtc::ArrayView<const std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>> E2,
76 const std::vector<bool>& converged_filters) {
77 UpdateAccumulatedSpectra(X2, Y2, E2, converged_filters);
78 UpdateBands(converged_filters);
79
80 if (use_onset_detection_) {
81 DecreaseErlePerBandForLowRenderSignals();
82 }
83
84 const size_t num_capture_channels = erle_.size();
85 for (size_t ch = 0; ch < num_capture_channels; ++ch) {
86 auto& erle = erle_[ch];
87 erle[0] = erle[1];
88 erle[kFftLengthBy2] = erle[kFftLengthBy2 - 1];
89
90 auto& erle_oc = erle_onset_compensated_[ch];
91 erle_oc[0] = erle_oc[1];
92 erle_oc[kFftLengthBy2] = erle_oc[kFftLengthBy2 - 1];
93 }
94}
95
96void SubbandErleEstimator::Dump(
97 const std::unique_ptr<ApmDataDumper>& data_dumper) const {
98 data_dumper->DumpRaw("aec3_erle_onset", ErleDuringOnsets()[0]);
99}
100
101void SubbandErleEstimator::UpdateBands(
102 const std::vector<bool>& converged_filters) {
103 const int num_capture_channels = static_cast<int>(accum_spectra_.Y2.size());
104 for (int ch = 0; ch < num_capture_channels; ++ch) {
105 // Note that the use of the converged_filter flag already imposed
106 // a minimum of the erle that can be estimated as that flag would
107 // be false if the filter is performing poorly.
108 if (!converged_filters[ch]) {
109 continue;
110 }
111
112 if (accum_spectra_.num_points[ch] != kPointsToAccumulate) {
113 continue;
114 }
115
116 std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2> new_erle;
117 std::array<bool, kFftLengthBy2> is_erle_updated;
118 is_erle_updated.fill(false);
119
120 for (size_t k = 1; k < kFftLengthBy2; ++k) {
121 if (accum_spectra_.E2[ch][k] > 0.f) {
122 new_erle[k] = accum_spectra_.Y2[ch][k] / accum_spectra_.E2[ch][k];
123 is_erle_updated[k] = true;
124 }
125 }
126
127 if (use_onset_detection_) {
128 for (size_t k = 1; k < kFftLengthBy2; ++k) {
129 if (is_erle_updated[k] && !accum_spectra_.low_render_energy[ch][k]) {
130 if (coming_onset_[ch][k]) {
131 coming_onset_[ch][k] = false;
132 if (!use_min_erle_during_onsets_) {
133 float alpha =
134 new_erle[k] < erle_during_onsets_[ch][k] ? 0.3f : 0.15f;
135 erle_during_onsets_[ch][k] = rtc::SafeClamp(
136 erle_during_onsets_[ch][k] +
137 alpha * (new_erle[k] - erle_during_onsets_[ch][k]),
138 min_erle_, max_erle_[k]);
139 }
140 }
141 hold_counters_[ch][k] = kBlocksForOnsetDetection;
142 }
143 }
144 }
145
146 auto update_erle_band = [](float& erle, float new_erle,
147 bool low_render_energy, float min_erle,
148 float max_erle) {
149 float alpha = 0.05f;
150 if (new_erle < erle) {
151 alpha = low_render_energy ? 0.f : 0.1f;
152 }
153 erle =
154 rtc::SafeClamp(erle + alpha * (new_erle - erle), min_erle, max_erle);
155 };
156
157 for (size_t k = 1; k < kFftLengthBy2; ++k) {
158 if (is_erle_updated[k]) {
159 const bool low_render_energy = accum_spectra_.low_render_energy[ch][k];
160 update_erle_band(erle_[ch][k], new_erle[k], low_render_energy,
161 min_erle_, max_erle_[k]);
162 if (use_onset_detection_) {
163 update_erle_band(erle_onset_compensated_[ch][k], new_erle[k],
164 low_render_energy, min_erle_, max_erle_[k]);
165 }
166 }
167 }
168 }
169}
170
171void SubbandErleEstimator::DecreaseErlePerBandForLowRenderSignals() {
172 const int num_capture_channels = static_cast<int>(accum_spectra_.Y2.size());
173 for (int ch = 0; ch < num_capture_channels; ++ch) {
174 for (size_t k = 1; k < kFftLengthBy2; ++k) {
175 --hold_counters_[ch][k];
176 if (hold_counters_[ch][k] <=
177 (kBlocksForOnsetDetection - kBlocksToHoldErle)) {
178 if (erle_onset_compensated_[ch][k] > erle_during_onsets_[ch][k]) {
179 erle_onset_compensated_[ch][k] =
180 std::max(erle_during_onsets_[ch][k],
181 0.97f * erle_onset_compensated_[ch][k]);
182 RTC_DCHECK_LE(min_erle_, erle_onset_compensated_[ch][k]);
183 }
184 if (hold_counters_[ch][k] <= 0) {
185 coming_onset_[ch][k] = true;
186 hold_counters_[ch][k] = 0;
187 }
188 }
189 }
190 }
191}
192
193void SubbandErleEstimator::ResetAccumulatedSpectra() {
194 for (size_t ch = 0; ch < erle_during_onsets_.size(); ++ch) {
195 accum_spectra_.Y2[ch].fill(0.f);
196 accum_spectra_.E2[ch].fill(0.f);
197 accum_spectra_.num_points[ch] = 0;
198 accum_spectra_.low_render_energy[ch].fill(false);
199 }
200}
201
202void SubbandErleEstimator::UpdateAccumulatedSpectra(
203 rtc::ArrayView<const float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1> X2,
204 rtc::ArrayView<const std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>> Y2,
205 rtc::ArrayView<const std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>> E2,
206 const std::vector<bool>& converged_filters) {
207 auto& st = accum_spectra_;
208 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(st.E2.size(), E2.size());
209 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(st.E2.size(), E2.size());
210 const int num_capture_channels = static_cast<int>(Y2.size());
211 for (int ch = 0; ch < num_capture_channels; ++ch) {
212 // Note that the use of the converged_filter flag already imposed
213 // a minimum of the erle that can be estimated as that flag would
214 // be false if the filter is performing poorly.
215 if (!converged_filters[ch]) {
216 continue;
217 }
218
219 if (st.num_points[ch] == kPointsToAccumulate) {
220 st.num_points[ch] = 0;
221 st.Y2[ch].fill(0.f);
222 st.E2[ch].fill(0.f);
223 st.low_render_energy[ch].fill(false);
224 }
225
226 std::transform(Y2[ch].begin(), Y2[ch].end(), st.Y2[ch].begin(),
227 st.Y2[ch].begin(), std::plus<float>());
228 std::transform(E2[ch].begin(), E2[ch].end(), st.E2[ch].begin(),
229 st.E2[ch].begin(), std::plus<float>());
230
231 for (size_t k = 0; k < X2.size(); ++k) {
232 st.low_render_energy[ch][k] =
233 st.low_render_energy[ch][k] || X2[k] < kX2BandEnergyThreshold;
234 }
235
236 ++st.num_points[ch];
237 }
238}
239
240} // namespace webrtc
